titles.title: NO SPILLS Act of 2024
Nautical Oversight, Safety, and Protection of Inflammable Liquids by Law in the Sea Act of 2024
NO SPILLS Act of 2024

A bill to amend the Deepwater Port Act of 1974 to improve community outreach, public participation, and the consideration of community and environmental impacts with respect to the issuance of a license under that Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
